title: Who is Harry Benjamin? F1 commentator replaces David Croft at 2025 Azerbaijan GP
summary: BBC 5 Live commentator Harry Benjamin will replace David Croft for the third time in 2025, calling the racing action for Sky Sports F1 at the Azerbaijan Grand Prix

qa_pairs.question: Who is the commentator that will replace David Croft for the 2025 Azerbaijan Grand Prix?
In which year will Harry Benjamin commentate at the Azerbaijan Grand Prix?
Which broadcasting network will Harry Benjamin be working for during the 2025 Azerbaijan GP?
